text: Blackboard Jungle is a 1955 American drama movie directed by Richard Brooks and based on the novel of the same name by Evan Hunter. It stars Glenn Ford, Sidney Poitier, Vic Morrow, Anne Francis, Louis Calhern, Paul Mazursky, Jamie Farr and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It was nominated for four Academy Awards. ==Other websites== * Category:1955 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Richard Brooks
title: Blackboard Jungle
